name: Crazy Rocket n Space X
description:
This is an amazing 2D game where you can put your piloting skills to the test and rescue the astronauts.

Your mission is to avoid the fireballs while rescuing the astronauts and reach the earth. Watch out the meteorite behind you and don't let it destroy your space shuttle.

How to play?
Tap the screen to navigate in the orbit and stop when you feel in a safe position. Do not cross the fireballs as they will destroy your space shuttle.
Keep navigating till you reach the Earth.

Complete the 30 Levels to win the game.

So, How much astronauts can you rescue?
